# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="48dc3-102">Isprazni prijemno poštansko sanduče</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="48dc3-103">**Moje Outlook.com prijemno poštansko sanduče je prazno**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-103">**My Outlook.com inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="48dc3-104">Određeni dodaci u pregledaču Firefox mogu da spreče učitavanje prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48dc3-105">Posetite podršku za Firefox da biste saznali kako da [onemogućite ili uklonite dodatke](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [disable or remove Add-ons](https://aka.ms/mozilla-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="48dc3-106">**Želim da ispraznim svoje prijemno poštansko sanduče**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="48dc3-107">Ako želite da ispraznite prijemno poštansko sanduče i izbrišete sve svoje e-poruke:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48dc3-108">Izaberite krug</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="48dc3-109">pored [prijemnog poštanskog sandučeta](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) na vrhu liste poruka da biste izabrali sve svoje poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="48dc3-110">Na vrhu stranice izaberite **praznu fasciklu** (ili **praznu** / stavku "prazno" ili "prazno"**Ako je** fokusirano prijemno poštansko sanduče).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="48dc3-111">Izaberite **Izbriši sve**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="48dc3-112">Da biste počistili sve izbrisane poruke, otvorite [fasciklu "Izbrisane stavke](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) " i izaberite stavku " **Isprazni fasciklu** > "**Izbrišite sve**, a zatim izaberite stavku **"spasi stavke izbrisane iz ove fascikle** " na vrhu stranice i ponovo izaberite stavku **"Isprazni fasciklu"** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="48dc3-113">Više informacija potražite u članku [Brisanje e-pošte u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48dc3-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
